name: Woven Shield
description: A simple shield for those still mastering the basics of melee combat.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s next strike by 3.

name: Leather Shield
description: A shield made from rawhide. Only good against badly-sharpened swords.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s next strike by 6.

name: Composite Shield
description: A shield of planks reinforced with copper, straps, and the wearer's enthusiasm.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s next strike by 11.

name: Light Shield
description: Simple round shield that will withstand a heavy sword's strike.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s next strike by 15.

name: Iron-shod Shield
description: This iron reinforced wooden shield provides confidence in battle.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s 2 next strike by 25.
obtained: Diagram Unlocked: Design can be obtained from Forsaken Dungeon

name: Black Iron-shod Shield
description: This shield is notably more durable than its common variant.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s 2 next strike by 25.

name: Buckler
description: Perfect for you if size doesn't matter.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 30 for 1 sec.
obtained: Diagram Unlocked: Design can be obtained from Aissa

name: Stunning Shield
description: This shield's unique alloy will make enemies regret attacking you.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 40 for 2 sec.

name: Templar Shield
description: This shield's unique alloy will make enemies regret attacking you.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 40 for 2 sec.
obtained: Level rewards in Cunning Scrooge's Card Game

name: Damned Champion's Shield
description: If you unleash its power, it will help you poison attackers.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 40 for 3 sec.
itemEffect: When activated, the shield poisons attackers.

name: Gladiator Shield
description: Helps withstand even the strongest of enemy blows.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 50 for 1 sec.

name: Ice Shield
description: Easily stops enemies, in every meaning of the word...
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 50 for 2 sec.
itemEffect: When activated, the shield can freeze attackers.

name: Fiery Retribution Shield
description: According to legend, the flames will not touch those who are pure of heart.
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage of your enemy’s next strike by 50.
itemEffect:
When blocking, deals 100 fire damage to all nearby enemies.
Scares the Night Guest away.

name: Emperor's Shield
use: Activating this reduces the physical damage from all attacks by 150 for 3 sec.
itemEffect: When blocking, the shield slows attack speed and movement for 2 seconds.
